title: Hayes Creek (British Columbia)
text: Hayes Creek is a creek in the <a href="Similkameen%20Country">Similkameen</a> region of <a href="British%20Columbia">British Columbia</a>. Hayes Creek used to be called Five Mile Creek. The creek flows south into the <a href="Similkameen%20River">Similkameen River</a>, five miles east of <a href="Princeton%2C%20British%20Columbia">Princeton, British Columbia</a>. The creek was discovered in 1887 and mined for <a href="gold">gold</a>.
